name: Monster Hunter for GBA
description:
Welcome to the world of monster hunter! ...more or less!

I did not have the time to implement all the mechanics I wanted to have but its a good sketch of what a Monster Hunter on a GBA could look like :)

A controller is recommended but you can also play with a keyboard.

Also, I might work on it atfer the jam to add more moves and more weapon type!

Credits for the music : Bulby
